name: #1 Gardar Drazlad
description:
Gardar Drazlad

Race: Human

Subraces and Variants:
Ethnicity: Gur

Physical Characteristics:
Age: 29 years
Height: 5'7"
Weight: 141 lbs.
Eyes: Dark Brown
Skin: Brown

Gender: Female
Class: Cleric
Background: Marine
Occupation: Artisan or guild member

Trait: I become cantankerous and quiet in the rain.
Ideal: Might. The strong train so that they might rule those who are weak. (Evil)
Bond: I'm searching for a fellow marine captured by an elusive enemy.
Flaw: I grow combative and unpredictable when I drink.
Hardship: Stowaway. For days, you hid in the bilge of an enemy ship, surviving on brackish water and foolhardy rats. At the right moment, you crept up to the deck and took over the ship on your own.

Description:
Appearance: Missing fingers
High Ability: Constitution-hardy, hale, healthy
Low Ability: Wisdom-oblivious, absentminded
Talent: Speaks several languages fluently
Mannerism: Taps fingers
Interaction Trait: Arrogant
Values: Beauty (Good), Protective of close family members
Flaw or Secret: Arrogance
